acts.title: Act 1 — First Date
steps: You decide to meet someone new for coffee.
Your child is staying with your ex.
Do you tell your ex or keep it private?

acts.title: Act 2 — Introducing the Idea
steps: Weeks later your child asks who you were talking to.
Be honest but gentle, change subject, or dismiss quickly.

acts.title: Act 3 — First Reactions
steps: Your ex confronts you; choose to reassure, argue, or refuse to discuss.

acts.title: Act 4 — Resolution
steps: Neutral path: tensions remain but manageable.
